item.title: Rhombus Copay

item.title: Rhombus Copay
item.description: About Rhombus Copay While it doesn’t offer all of available features (compared to other Rhombus wallets) it offers some unique ones. Mainly, Rhombus Copay is the most accessible mobile Rhombus wallet and allows user-friendly multisignature wallets for increased security of your funds, or even sharing the wallet across multiple people. Google Play App Store Download for desktop Report bugs Preview of Rhombus Copay app on mobile Features Browse & compare Rhombus Copay’s features with other available wallets.
